post:
**HTTP Zoom (www.httpzoom.com) is a HTTP Simple (www.httpsimple.com) brand geared towards the lowend market.**

We have, for several years, provided premium quality hosting, VPS, and dedicated services. Now we bring that same level of quality and customer support into the Lowend Market place.

**How are we different from the rest?**
1) We have a long track record in making our customers happy
2) We already have existing infrastructure being used from our parent company, who have been successful since 2007.
3) All hardware is enterprise level

Due to a large amount of requests we have opened an OpenVZ platform, which features, Dual Quad Core CPU's and Hardware Raid 1. None of our VPS platforms are oversold as a **company policy**.


**Special Offer**

OVM - 128
Price £7.50 / Half Year 
Price £12 / Year
Platform OpenVZ
128MB Dedicated Ram
256MB Burst Ram
8GB Diskspace
50GB Transfer
CPU Fair Share
100mb Shared Port
SolusVM Control Panel

[Order Here](https://billing.httpsimple.com/cart.php?systpl=httpzoom&a=add&pid=41&carttpl=singlepage)

We have 60 VPS slots available on this node. This special offer is excluded from our current 90% off first month promotion.

Further packages (Including our 15K SAS based VPS) are available via [Our Website](http://www.httpzoom.com)

Servers are located Berkshire, UK
To Trace Route or Ping our IP use: 78.129.226.126
